website_summaries.verdict: High-quality bag for two bodyboards up to 42 inches or one board up to 44 inches.
pros: Front compartment with drainage mesh bottom is well-designed for sand and moisture release of your wet gear
Includes padded backpack straps, side carry handle, and internal pocket
cons: Some worry that material might snag if not careful when using zipper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a quality product. But never forget to rinse the zipper with fresh water once you pack your boards.
customer_reviews.author: Lance E. Walden

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for boards
customer_reviews.text: Wish I got this bag sooner. It’s perfect. Depending on the boards you can fit three. It just makes getting down to the water less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: TSDK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much I'm ordering another one. It easily fits two good sized boogie boards. It has a zipper and pouch in the front for a wet bathing suit and towel. You wear it like a backpack. It's strong and durable not cheap. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kaleigh kailani

customer_reviews.title: Bag Ripped within 1st Week
customer_reviews.text: Bag already has ripped. Put two boards in there only a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got something to ride my board on my bike to the ocean to catch some waves.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Fast and reliable shipping. Holds my two body boards, one 40” and another one 42”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I love it protects and fits my 42 inch board and my 40 inch board
customer_reviews.author: ezekielsmommy

customer_reviews.title: Value for your dollar
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bag and holds two boogie boards easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Fits 45” board
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 45” board. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I owned several bodyboard bags in my lifetime. This by far was my worst purchase. First of all the zipper on the storage compartment broke off within one year. Now the bag is falling part at the seems. I carry 2 boards and usually squirt it off after a day at the beach. The interior fabric has started to deteriorate. I know this is a cheaper bag and now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Erwin

product_meta.title: GUL Arica Bodyboard Bag Back Pack for 2 x 42 Adult Bodyboards. Black/Yellow
product_meta.description: Gul Arica Black / Yellow Bodyboard Bag Back Pack. This Gul Arica Bodyboard Bag allows you to store up to 2 x 42" Adult Bodyboards in the main compartment. The front compartment with drainage mesh bottom allows you to store your wet gear and leave it drying. Perfect for any bodyboarder on the move. Features - Adjustable padded shoulder straps. Zip up main compartment with mesh bottom. Large front zip compartment with mesh bottom for accessory storage. Side carry handle. Internal pocket for keys / surfboard wax. Gul graphics. Will fit 2 x 42" adult bodyboards. This item is sold and dispatched from the United Kingdom. Items are usually dispatched with in 1 working day of purchase. For purchases from the UK please allow 2 to 3 working days for delivery. (1 to 2 days if 1st class postage is selected at checkout). For purchases from European Countries please allow 7 working days for delivery. For purchase from the Rest of The World please allow up to 14 working days for delivery. Working days are classed as Mondays to Fridays and exclude weekends and Bank Holidays.
feature_bullets: This Gul Arica Bodyboard Bag allows you to store up to 2 x 42" Adult Bodyboards in the main compartment. The front compartment with drainage mesh bottom allows you to store your wet gear and leave it drying. Perfect for any bodyboarder on the move.

Features - Adjustable padded shoulder straps. Zip up main compartment with mesh bottom. Large front zip compartment with mesh bottom for accessory storage. Side carry handle. Internal pocket for keys / surfboard wax. Gul graphics. Will fit 2 x 42" adult bodyboards.

This item is sold and dispatched from the United Kingdom. Items are usually dispatched with in 1 working day of purchase. For purchases from the UK please allow 2 to 3 working days for delivery. (1 to 2 days if 1st class postage is selected at checkout).

For purchases from European Countries please allow 7 working days for delivery. For purchase from the Rest of The World please allow up to 14 working days for delivery. Working days are classed as Mondays to Fridays and exclude weekends and Bank Holidays.
